guru-widuhalpathiwaru niyojanaya karana wruththiya samithi samaga adhyapana baladharin me dakwa kisidu sakachchawak sidukara nomathi bawata chodana karana guru sangam nayaka josap stalin pawasanne, dewana adiyare di pasalata kandawana 5, 11 saha 13 wasara wala adhyayana katayuthuwalata sambandha nowana saha me dakwa aarambhayata dina thiranaya kara nomathi 1, 2 shreniwala guruwaru pasalata paminima awashya da anawashya da yanna pilibanda me dakwa pahadili kirimak sidukara nomathi bawayi.
